name: Phoenix Springs: Prologue
description:
It begins with an investigation: find your brother Leo. You already know where it ends.



Point and click your way through the first 20-40 minutes of Phoenix Springs, a mystery adventure game that updates the classic genre for the modern player.
Immerse yourself in the first act of an atmospheric neo-noir universe with frustration-free controls and a streamlined UI.

Connect leads and clues with the world around you, or mention them in conversations to progress.

Discard false leads and red herrings as you solve logical puzzles designed to challenge and delight fans of story-rich interactive experiences.



  • Fully-voice acted
  • Handdrawn art and animation
  • Streamlined UI
  • First act only (20-40 mins gameplay)
